channel.title: Rumors
channel.description: I've heard that Neonknight is telling people that I've given him SRL Dev private stuff, I can assure you that these rumors aren't true. If they exist than it's just cuz neon is mad at me for not making yet another little proggy to make life easier for him while i didn't have the time.

item.title: Rumors
item.dc:creator: @Flyboy Flyboy
item.description:
@Flyboy wrote:

I tried to reason with him in the past… it was wasted effort. Because of him and others like him I no longer us live chat (like msn)… too much of my work day was been used up determining who it was that was calling me and then just having to put them on the ignor list…

Permanent ignoring seems to be the best way to get him to loose interest.

Read full topic

item.title: Rumors
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Oh well, I blocked neon, gives me more time to listen to normal ppl

Read full topic

item.title: Rumors
item.dc:creator: @Wizzup Wizzup?
item.description:
@Wizzup wrote:

Look, NeonKnight77 ALWAYS lies.
It is just a very sad child who needs to be taken away from the computer by his parents, and an expert to help him to skill his social skills up.
He is kept mailing Fakawi like every 2 days… it’s funny too see Fakawi’s history.

I don’t know what posseses this guy, but he was so desperate to get the autoresponder, that he claims to let ruler “hack” into our SvN (months ago). (What they claim, no proof though, we looked through the IP lists, that asked for the responder.)

Well, at least he got his account banned in rs, same as Geno. While Fakawi had 6 bans in 19 minutes and got un banned lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Rumors
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

We could cut of his bawlz ^^

Anyway, I spoke to him and he denies everything (like i’d expected)
altough, Geno, who told me about the rumors doesn’t seem to be in a rush to get his chatlogs out either

Read full topic

item.title: Rumors
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

Thanks, i appreciate you not making anymore stuff for him.
The more we cut him off, the less he can do

item.title: Rumors
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

And to believe that i still gave him some credit =/

EDIT:

[code]Dear Freddy(aka Freddy1990),

I have not cracked any scripts nor will I want to. I would like proof.
Thank you.

Sincerely, Neonknight77 [/code]
lol, my name aint freddy

Read full topic

item.title: Rumors
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

neon is a little prick that thinks he is better than everyone else and deserves everything, its best to completely ignore him, thats what I do and its been great

Read full topic

item.title: Rumors
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

[quote=“Starblaster100, post:4, topic:5785”]Thanks a lot.

Just to let you know, that was used to disable the auth on my ess miner Not blaming you or anthing, i dont mind it had a lot of bugs in it

Anyway, thanks a lot, i appreciate you posting your proggies.[/quote]
O_O Awch, srr :S
I had no idea what he needed it for, i just wrote the code based on what he asked, I had no idea what he needed it for

EDIT:
Oh well, that’s solved.

[code]Dear Peter (aka Neonknight77),

It has come to my attention that a program i wrote for you “StM Script.exe” was misused to crack the auth system of a scar script.
Therefor I will no longer create any specific software for you.

Sincerely, Freddy1990.[/code]

Read full topic

thanks
